price: "Allaha nam", rekoše oni, "doista si ti još uvijek u prijašnjoj zabludi."
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
